member.name: M:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Global.WinForms.Core.CtrlFormBase.DoOnceAtFirstTrueResult(System.String,System.TimeSpan,System.Func{System.Boolean},System.Action,System.Action,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Define an action that is only needed to run once when the test condition to become true the very first timeoutInSeconds
member.param: A Unique name of the job to add
How frequent this job needs to run
Condition to be tested
Action to do when the condition first becomes true
Optional action to do when the condition is false. This will run every time the condition is false
Set if the job should run immediately
member.returns: Return a boolean to tell if the job was added successfully
